meaningMnemonic: You take <radical>gold</radical> in exchange for executing <radical>orders</radical> to construct a <kanji>buzzer</kanji>. You are a <kanji>small bell</kanji> maker and someone orders you to make one into a buzzer in exchange for some gold. This is how you make a living.
readingMnemonic: Finally the <kanji>buzzer</kanji> is done. You’ve earned your gold. You test the buzzer and it goes <reading>rin</reading>g (りん)! Ring! Ring! Ring! Ring ring ring ring ring! Man, that ringing is annoying but hey, that’s what buzzers do.
